turns.user_input: It's just... I have the startup launch next week, Emma's science fair project is due Friday, Jake is struggling with reading, the house needs repairs, and I haven't exercised in a month. I don't even know where to start.

expected_behavior.reasoning: PROACTIVE: Complex multi-domain problem with clear overwhelm - visual map would help without being asked

internal_notes.observations: User has clearly hit complexity threshold with 5+ interconnected concerns across multiple life domains: work (startup launch), parenting (Emma's project, Jake's reading), home (repairs), and health (exercise). This is causing analysis paralysis ('don't know where to start'). User needs visual organization to reduce cognitive load.
internal_notes.reasoning: Creating stress map because user described multiple stressors across different domains with clear overwhelm. This meets complexity threshold and will help them prioritize and see manageable next steps.
internal_notes.context_updates: User has startup launching next week, daughter Emma has science fair Friday, son Jake struggling with reading, house needs repairs, hasn't exercised in month
